overview: German Patent lawyer, European trademark attorney, European Design Attorney, Ph.D. Chemist in organometallic chemistry Member of the German Patent Attorney Bar (Patentanwaltskammer, Munich) Representative for the German Patent and Trademark Office (GPTO, DPMA, Munich) Representative for the European Office for Harmonization of the internal market (OHIM, Allicante, Spain) Experienced in filing patent applications, utility model (Gebrauchsmuster), trademark (Marke, Werktitel, Unternehmenskennzeichen), service mark, design protection (Geschmacksmuster, European Community Design). Technical expertises in the Field of Chemistry, Mechanical Engineering, Power Generation, Material Sciences, Laser und Medical Technology.
